Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the sale of new motor vehicle child restraint systems
Summary: Requires any person, firm, partnership, association, limited liability company, corporation, or other entity that sells new motor vehicle child restraint systems to also sell motor vehicle child restraint system warning devices.
LawCode: Add ยง399-uu, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the sale of new motor vehicle child restraint systems
